text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt
    CodeDisplay
    94002Ventilation assist and management, initiation of pressure or volume preset ventilators for assisted or controlled breathing; hospital inpatient/observation, initial day
    94003Ventilation assist and management, initiation of pressure or volume preset ventilators for assisted or controlled breathing; hospital inpatient/observation, each subsequent day
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    26763009Controlled ventilation procedure and therapy, initiation and management (procedure)

name: VentilatorProcedures
title: Ventilator Procedures
description: Codes used to report a ventilation procedure
